system.description: The character can combine a devastating charge with a full-auto fusillade, bringing overwhelming firepower to bear while closing with the enemy.
system.benefit: Character can spend a Full Action to make a Charge Movement Diretly at a Distant Enemy, as long as the Charge does not bring the character into melee range of another enemy, they can immeidately make a Full-Auto Burst Action with a Ranged Weapon as a Free Action, this has a +0 to the Ballistic Test instead of the normal -10.

specialAbilities.name: Ripper Charge
specialAbilities.description: As a Full Action, charge directly at a distant enemy. If the charge doesn't bring you into melee with another enemy, immediately make a Full-Auto Burst as a Free Action with +0 to Ballistic Skill (instead of -10).
